summary: Myself, a Redguard follower for your character
descriptionHtml:
I\'ve essentially made myself in Skyrim and I can be your follower if you want

She has Iron/Hide armor, a silver sword and an iron sword... and can be found in Arcadia\'s Cauldron (she is her friend, staying there)

She is level 1 and levels automatically to 100 with the Player, she has the potential to be married and is essential.

This is my first upload of a follower to this vast internet, so do be kind

You need the ApachiiSkyHair from here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

I specifically used
\"ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_4_Full\"
and
\"ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_0\"

otherwise I\'m pretty sure it\'ll glitch out and make her have bright purple or green or whatever

It should work fine beyond that though.
If there are any issues, let me know and I\'ll try to fix it
author: KayleeMarie
